titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2010) to amend the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to establish a Corporation for National Service, enhance opportunities for national service, and provide national service educational awards to persons participating in such service, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-220, by Mr. Beilenson.

Upon the adoption of this resolution, it shall be in order to consider the conference report on H.R. 2010. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 77.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 256 - 166 (Roll no. 407).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2010 (amending the National and Community Service Act of 1990).
